data.name: ColumnSettings
desc: describes the common properties of a database column.

properties.name: Align
desc: specifies the alignment of columns text.
If the value is VOID , a default alignment should be used according to the datatype of the column.

properties.name: ControlDefault
desc: describes the default value which should be displayed by a control when moving to a new row.

properties.name: ControlModel
desc: indicates a control model which defines the settings for layouting.

properties.name: FormatKey
desc: contains the index of the number format that is used for the column.
The proper value can be determined by using the com.sun.star.util.XNumberFormatter interface.
If the value is VOID , a default number format should be used according to the datatype of the column.

properties.name: HelpText
desc: describes an optional help text which can be used by UI components when representing this column.

properties.name: Hidden
desc: determines whether the column should be displayed or not.

properties.name: Position
desc: Position of the column within a grid.
If the value is VOID , the default position should be taken according.

properties.name: Width
desc: specifies the width of the column displayed in a grid, the unit is 10THMM.
If the value is VOID , a default width should be used according to the label of the column.
